titleStmt.title: The foure summons of the Shulamite A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse vpon Rogation Sunday, the 5. of May. 1605. By John Rawlinson, Bachelor of Diuinitie, and fellow of Saint Iohns Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Rawlinson, John, 1576-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne, by Simon Waterson [in London],

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; pages cropped, stained and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne
